Meta.title: Pet Operation
Meta.author: Tomy
Meta.description:
[h1]Pet Operation[/h1]
[h2]Overview[/h2]
You can individually instruct your pets to perform combat actions. Currently the following settings are supported.
[list] [*] Formation. [/list]
[h2]Details[/h2]
[h3]Formation[/h3]
You can specify the vanguard/rear guard.
Pets in the vanguard will push the pets in the rear guard to the front.
